issue.title: Accessibility issue: Page requires horizontal scrolling at 320x256 viewport on /partners/service-channel-partners%20

findings.problemShort: page requires horizontal scrolling at 320x256 viewport
findings.solutionShort: ensure content is responsive and does not require horizontal scrolling at small viewport sizes
findings.solutionLong: The page has a scroll width of 940px but a client width of only 320px at 320x256 viewport, requiring horizontal scrolling. This violates WCAG 2.1 Level AA Success Criterion 1.4.10 (Reflow).
